column1: 将即时清洁面板合并到
column2: Merge the Instant Clean panel into the

column1: 根据你的设置来清洁选中的对象： 仅选择
column2: Clean the selected objects based on your settings.\nShift: Selection only

column1: 根据设置清理选中的对象
column2: Clean the selected objects based on your settings

column1: 分解几何体的最大角度
column2: Maximum angle at which geometry will be dissolved

column1: 仅与一个面相连的边缘
column2: Edges which are connected to one face only

column1: 将标记为锐利的边缘排除在溶解之外
column2: Excludes edges marked as sharp from the dissolve

column1: 将标记为接缝的边缘排除在溶解之外
column2: Excludes edges marked as seam from the dissolve

column1: 从溶解中排除 UV 岛边界的边缘
column2: Excludes edges which are boundary of UV islands from the dissolve

column1: 从溶解中排除划分两个不同指定材质的边缘
column2: Excludes edges which delimit two different assigned materials from the dissolve

column1: 几何体溶解的最大角度
column2: Maximal angle at which geometry will be dissolved

column1: 具有与两个以上面相连或位于网格内部（如内部面）的边的面
column2: Faces with edges which are connected to more than two faces or are inside the mesh (e.g. interior faces)

column1: 将连接网格两部分的顶点分割为零尺寸点
column2: Splits vertices which are connecting two parts of a mesh in a zero size point

column1: 不包含任何面的几何体
column2: Geometry not consisting of any faces
Fill up holes in the mesh

column1: 只填充边长不超过此值的孔
column2: Fill only holes with up to this amount of sides

column1: 将顶点不在同一平面上的面移动到平均平面上，使其扁平化
column2: Flatten faces which vertices are not in the same plane by moving them to match an average plane
Repeat the flatten process this many times

column1: 决定移动顶点的力度，使所有面尽可能平整
column2: Determines how strong vertices will be moved to make all faces as flat as possible

column1: 对非平面面进行三角化处理，以创建尽可能多的平面面
column2: Triangulate non-planar faces to create as many planar faces as possible

column1: 只有扭曲程度大于此值的面才会被三角化
column2: Only faces that are more distorted than this amount will be triangulated

column1: 仅对当前选区执行所有操作
column2: Execute all operations only for the current selection

column1: 重新计算每个面的法线
column2: Recalculate the normal of each face
Smoothes normals based of the angle

column1: 将被视为平滑的面法线之间的最大角度
column2: Maximal angle between face normals that will be considered as smooth

column1: 清除可用的自定义分割法线
column2: Clears custom split normals if any available

column1: 清除锐边，即自定义分割法线产生的锐边
column2: Clears sharp edges i.a. resulting from custom split normals

column1: 删除所有未为网格分配材质的材质槽
column2: Removes all material slots whose materials are not assigned to the mesh

column1: 将所有以相同名称开始的材料分别合并为一个材料
column2: Merges all materials starting with the same name into one, respectively

column1: 从文件中破坏性地删除材料双倍数据
column2: Remove material doubles from the file destructively

column1: 删除所有未分配顶点的顶点组
column2: Removes all vertex groups which have no vertices assigned to it
Vertices which are not part of an edge
Edges which are not part of an face
Faces which are not connected to other faces

column1: 视为相同的位置之间的最大距离
column2: Maximum Distance between positions to be considered as same
Faces with an area of zero

column1: 视为零的面的最大面积
column2: Maximum area of an face to be considered as zero

column1: 连接两条边的顶点角度为零
column2: Vertices which are connecting two edges by an angle of zero

column1: 两条边之间的最大角度为零
column2: Maximum angle between two edges to be considered as zero

column1: 网格将转换成的拓扑类型
column2: Type of topology which the mesh will be converted to

column1: 用于计算四边形到三角形的方法
column2: Method which will be used for the quad to triangle computation

column1: 仅分解角度较小的边缘以创建四边形
column2: Dissolve only edges with lower angles to create quads

column1: 仅当整体形状变化小于此角度时才尝试转换为四边形
column2: Only try to convert to a quad if the overall shape change is lower than this angle

column1: 用于将 ngon 转换为三角形计算的方法
column2: Method which will be used for the ngon to triangle computation

column1: 将标记为尖锐的边缘排除在转换之外
column2: Excludes edges marked as sharp from the convertion

column1: 将标记为缝的边缘排除在转换之外
column2: Excludes edges marked as seam from the convertion

column1: 转换后顶点颜色保持不变
column2: Leaves vertex colors unchanged after convertion

column1: 从转换中排除划定两种不同指定材质的边缘
column2: Excludes edges which delimit two different assigned materials from the convertion
